item.title: CVE-2024-47639|2024-10-05T13:01:19.940Z -- vdocipher -- vdocipher
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VdoCipher allows Stored XSS.This issue affects VdoCipher: from n/a through 1.29.
